meanings.definition: Software that is available for use at no cost.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded some freewares for my computer without paying any money.
meanings.sent2: Many websites offer freewares for users to download and use without any charges.
meanings.sent3: The freewares were like little gifts for my computer, making it more fun to use.
meanings.sent4: Using freewares is like getting free snacks at a party - enjoyable and cost-free.
meanings.sent5: The world of freewares opened up a whole new realm of possibilities for my computer.

meanings.definition: The act of distributing software for free.
meanings.sent1: The company's freewares distribution strategy helped them gain a large user base.
meanings.sent2: Freewares have become a popular way for developers to share their creations with a wide audience.
meanings.sent3: The freewares distribution event turned into a frenzy as people rushed to get their hands on the free software.
meanings.sent4: The concept of freewares distribution is like spreading kindness in the digital world.
meanings.sent5: The impact of freewares distribution can be seen in the increased accessibility of software for all.
